mapper.select: SELECT ts.*, p.id as p_id, p.project_name as p_name FROM test_scenarios ts LEFT JOIN project p ON ts.project_id = p.id ORDER BY ts.id DESC
SELECT ts.*, p.id as p_id, p.project_name as p_name FROM test_scenarios ts LEFT JOIN project p ON ts.project_id = p.id WHERE ts.project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY ts.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_scenarios (name, description, project_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{projectId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
